item.description:
Best Friends is happy to announce the opening of our New Doggie Day Camp!
Doggie Daycamp is a great way to socialize your dog during the day while you are away at work. Drop your dog off for a day of play and then spend a relaxing evening together at home.
On August 14th we are having our open enrollment day, bring in your dog for an interview and sign up for the program which starts on monday the 16th. We have full or half day plans, Camp is open Monday thru Saturday.

group.name: The Bethany Friendly Dog Meetup Group

item.name: Doggie Daycamp open Enrollment day
